data.message: defiant def describes you! its amazing what an amazing success story you are. you went against the grain. you did things noone had done before and noone can copy you. you are unique! thank you for that em:)

replies.message: thanks for making this public! i enjoyed watching Defiant it was really interesting to see. one of my all time favorite em songs of course dr. dre is in it:) hard to choose there are alot of good ones:) always makes me smile:)  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E5a93wABHNM
